content: @Bryn Rhodes Thanks for the CQL deep dive this week! Great job! At the conclusion today, there was mention of CQL as it relates to CDS and CDS-Hooks as well as how CQL relates to clinical quality improvement. I don't see where those events are scheduled yet. IS that true, they haven't been scheduled?
They are listed in the PDF HL7 Education Calendar, SMART on FHIR & CDS Hooks, June 22-24, and Clinical Quality & Decision Support on FHIR, October 5-7.
And thank you for attending and the engagement during the session!
